text:
- cocoon 2.1.5.1 / lenya 1.2.1
- default publication, file upload works, EXCEPT WHEN title field is empty
- there is an asterisk (*) indicating this, but the field IS NOT CHECKED
creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
gregor@apache.org
text: there is javascript code to check this, why does this not work for you?

creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
text:
the javascript code is not delievered (we have a problem with this particular
installation - didn't realize that, sorry!); all works well on other installations
